title: Signalist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player to intercept, you are told all of the target's info/notifications they receive and your target is simply told they lost communication.
- Alternatively, cause haywire. This causes every notification and info message received by players to be redirected to a random player. If possible, at least one Town Investigative result will be redirected to you. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you are given a random Evil faction that spawned in the game. You win with this faction.
- If there are no REFs or if the host chooses so, you may be assigned a Neutral Killing role instead.
- If you intercept a player in your assigned faction, their role is revealed to you.
- You may not intercept a player twice.
- Haywires only last one night.
- During a haywire, info messages will always display *"Your target--"* instead of a specified player.
- **Specialized Defense**: Your defense only applies to attacks from players in your assigned faction. Attacks from players outside your assigned faction ignore your defense unless you are given defense by other means.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have you assigned faction win, dead or alive.

desc:
Post 5461
*You are a hired inside man who disrupts communications to cause hysteria.*
